narrative:
No non-compliant items noted this inspection. 
Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class A breeder.
Please issue a Class A license.
License fee will be submitted by mail to:
USDA, APHIS, AC, ERO
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
  
Exit interview conducted with applicants wife.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED
